title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) for ESG and Sustainable Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Ability to explain the three core elements of ESG (Environment, Social, Governance) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Ability to perform projects analyzing real-world cases to estimate carbon emissions and propose reduction strategies.

Through team-based collaboration (4-person groups), learners derive three solutions to ESG-related problems and write a 10-page report (introduction–methodology–results–conclusion structure) applicable to language domains (chatbot dialogue design, AI translation quality assessment, etc.). The report must achieve 4/5 points or higher in at least three of the four rubric criteria (clarity, feasibility, innovativeness, applicability)
Ability to improve innovation and communication competencies by 20% or more compared to pre-assessment through PBL activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
